casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jimmy Allen ROBERTS 79P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2017 Jimmy Allen Roberts, for Roberts, Jimmy Allen. Amy Kunstling Irene, Special Deputy Attorney General, David Learner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of March 2017 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review: "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2017." Ervin, J. recused
